description: This is a Java interface for the UserRepository, extending JpaRepository, providing database access methods for User entities including findByEmail, findByAuthProviderAndProviderId, and existsByEmail.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for User entity database operations, providing custom query methods.

methods.name: findByEmail
methods.description: Finds a user by email address and returns an Optional<User>.

methods.name: findByAuthProviderAndProviderId
methods.description: Finds a user by authentication provider and provider-specific user ID, returning an Optional<User>.

methods.name: existsByEmail
methods.description: Checks if a user exists with the specified email, returning a boolean.
